item.title: LinqPad Query Mechanics
item.description: I love using LinqPad as a sandbox for C#. I use it to easily build LINQ queries that “just work”, but what is it doing behind the scene? TABLE_NAMEs: IOrderedQueryable I use Prismjs for code syntax highlighting on this site. I write pages in Markdown and I use Hugo to generate the site. Prism allows you to choose only the languages and features you want when you download it, so you can minimize its footprint.
